Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Authorizes guidelines governing the qualifications of bidders for public work contracts
Summary: Authorizes guidelines governing the qualifications of bidders for public work contracts.
LawCode: Amd ยง1678, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to authorizing the dormitory authority to utilize a prequalification list when seeking to bid or enter into a contract for public work
